name: Canadian citizenship test 2020
description: Are you preparing your Canadian citizenship test ? Or just interested to know the process and begin practicing and preparing for it ? Then this application is for you.  Canada Citizenship Process section will give you an overview about the different steps to get the Canadian citizenship, there are links to the official website to give you more informations and details from an authentic source.  Canada Citizenship Study Guide section will show you the categories of Citizenship test and let you study each one of them : you will read articles and watch videos to improve your knowledge on each subject.  Canada Citizenship Test practice section will offer you each time a collection of 20 questions to test yourself and practice your knowledge on real citizenship test questions. There are a hundred questions and you can repeat the test as many times as you want.  After each test you will have your score and a complete list of correct / incorrect answers so you can identify gaps on your canada citizenship knowledge and return to the study guide to focus more on wrong answers.  More improvements are to come on next versions. French version will be available soon.
